node.description: Heritage Collective is a woman-led furniture manufacturing company specializing in custom commercial furnishings with a focus on craftsmanship, community, and inclusive leadership.
node.name: Heritage Collective

node.description: Modline Interiors is a mid-sized U.S. manufacturer offering modular office furniture at scale. Their blend of automation and craftsmanship suits projects needing consistent output and customization.
node.name: Modline Interiors

node.description: NorthWorks is a leading North American-based furniture supplier serving clients in the U.S. and Canada. Known for durability and modern design, they maintain full compliance with U.S. and Canadian safety standards.
node.name: NorthWorks Furniture Co.
node.address:
128 King Street West
Toronto, ON M5H 1A8, Canada

node.description: Verde & Co. is a sustainability-first furniture manufacturer using reclaimed wood, biodegradable packaging, and carbon-neutral logistics to deliver products that are both functional and earth-friendly.
node.name: Verde & Co.
